string.name: desc
string.value: A throne fit for the world's greatest kings... which means it's JUST good enough for a BigWig.\nRecovers 100 HP, 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: How does a Demon Slayer celebrate a birthday? Do they even have them? 100 HP and 50 MP restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enjoy a special performance by the one and only Mercedes! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this chair to become more beautiful with Hilla! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seceonds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Anyone who isn't us is our enemy. Recovery 200 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Positively pimpin'. Recovery 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A good king knows when to save his strength and when to destroy his enemies. Recovery 100 HP and 200 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in Moon Chair in the early evenings while the Moon is up, 60 HP and 60 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sink yourself into this heavenly cake chair next to someone else who owns it as well, and watch it create a scrumptious effect! Mmm, this chair is so delicious you'll recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yummy! Use this chair next to someone else who's also using it, and a mouth-watering chocolate fondue appears. Smack your lips and dream about treats as you recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A comfortable, stylish seat that only forms when true love exists between two people. Recovers 45 HP, 45 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in Cherry Blossoms Chair, 30 HP and 30 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit in Fireworks Chair, 30 HP and 30 MP are restored every 10 seconds.

* Ignores 24% of the enemy's DEF when attacking.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maple Leaf that signifies Maple Story's 5 year journey. Something good will happen if you hold onto it for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: Entrance Level: Lv. 30 or above\nRecommended Level: Lv. 30 - Lv. 49

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: An unknown being that has yet to be explained.

string.name: desc
string.value: A solid ice crystal that contains Maha Charm. Hold onto it for one hour and the crystal will melt, enabling you to acquire the Charm.

string.name: desc
string.value: A charm that contains protection from Maha, the spirit of Polearm. Take this to Cassandra for a chance to answer questions and receive prizes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small candle given by Cassandra. This candle will turn off automatically when the game ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: 카산드라의 PC방 왕별이 들어있는 상자다. 90분 동안 잘 가지고 있으면, 카산드라의 PC방 왕별로 변한다. 접속종료하면 사라져 버린다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 카산드라가 찾고 있는 PC방 왕별이다. 접속종료하면 사라져버린다.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold onto this for 30 minutes and the cold weather will turn it into slush. It's so delicate it will disappear if you log out.

string.name: desc
string.value: Give it to Cassandra before it disappears!

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon Egg that Cassandra has left in your care. You must hold it close and keep it warm for one hour for it to hatch. Logging out will cause it to be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon that hatched from the egg Cassandra left with you. Return it to Cassandra to receive a reward!

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty compass that will eventually be used to make a Golden Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black feather from a bird that has not been identified. Keep an eye on it for 15 minutes and it will transform into a Bright Feather.\n#cIt will disappear once you log out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A bright feather from a bird that has not been identified. Take it over to the Maple Admin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A large star specially made to commemorate MapleStory's 6th anniversary. Carry it with you for 45 minutes to receive a Star Stamp.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Hawkeye sticker. Collect all 5 Cygnus Knights stickers to receive a limited reward.

string.name: desc
string.value: It takes 2 hours for the sand in Carta's Sandglass to trickle down to the bottom.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you log in everyday and play for an hour, You can upgrade the stat of evolving ring everyday. If you log out before one hour, you will need to come back to Gaga and stay for an hour again to upgrade your ring.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플 3000일을 기념하며 발매된 3000일 기념 우표다. 3000개를 모으면 메이플 3000일 훈장을 획득할 수 있다.

string.name: desc
string.value: Juicy red strawberries for making Strawberry Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet melon for making Melon Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tasty kiwi for making Kiwi Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A plump pineapple for making Pineapple Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Syrup for sweetening fruit juice. Keep it for 30 minutes, and it may develop a legendary taste...

string.name: desc
string.value: A fully matured maple syrup, featuring a bold, complex flavor unlike any other.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lamp spoken of in legends past. Keep the light on for 50 minutes to receive a Legends Coin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A star stone that contains energy from all the green stars in space. Place it in your Set-up window and fill up your gauge to activate the Going Green skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: A device that measures the amount of Good Vibe in Maple World. Keep it in your Set-up window for 30 minutes to complete the measurement.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Good Vibe Detector that has completed its measurement. The blinking light means it's done.

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-cooked chicken drumstick. It is both tasty and nutritious.

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-cooked chicken drumstick. It is both tasty and nutritious.

string.name: desc
string.value: An emblem worn by the commanders under the Black Mage. Their origin and full meaning are unknown.

string.name: desc
string.value: A symbol of Waikiki. Just looking at it makes you dream of the beach.

string.name: desc
string.value: An igloo, partially melted by the sun. Hold it for 30 minutes without logging out, and it may return to its legendary form...

string.name: desc
string.value: The legendary igloo. Gaze at it, and feel the howling winds of Alaska!

string.name: desc
string.value: A recorder that can be used to record nearby noises. It can record for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A completed recorder that has reached its 30-minute capacity. The recorded noise can be used to make sounds that monsters hate.

string.name: desc
string.value: A yummy roasted turkey you remember enjoying during Thanksgiving.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maple Leaf that pulsates with a golden aura.

string.name: desc
string.value: A good looking monkey doll. If you look closely, you might think that this monkey looks like a celebrity.

string.name: desc
string.value: A commemorative stamp that was made with the support of many Maplers.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal of stars that only have filled with the memory of blue stars that exist in the outer space.

string.name: desc
string.value: A dirty piece of trash. You should pick it up to keep this Maple World a cleaner place! Just wash your hands afterwards.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Totally Cool Melon that can be a material to make a tasty Melon juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: You put the rain-soaked Fireworks in the Magic Powder. Now they will dry out in about 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Thanks to the Magic Powder, these Fireworks are completely dry and ready to use! Take these to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old and faded photograph of someone.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old and worn out hankerchief. You can't even tell its original color.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bizarre device that might lead you to Cassandra's first love. Have this in your Set-up window for 30 minutes to get results.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Love Detector that has turned something up. Take this to Gaga and show him the results.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Golden Hammer 50%. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Special Potential Scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Clean Slate Scroll 10%. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for an Advanced Equip Enhancement Scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for an Armor Attack/Magic scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Weapon Scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Armor Stats Scroll. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wish Paper to wish for a Mochi Ice Cream Chair. Collect 30 and deliver them to Moon Bunny by clicking on the Event Notifier at the left side of the screen. \n#Cannot be used for other wishes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Song Pyun made of Rice Flour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Song Pyun made of Rice Flour and Mugworts Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Song Pyun made of Rice Flour and Red Mango Syrup.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Song Pyun made of Rice Flour and Gardenia Extract.

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty glass bottle that can hold moonlight. Hold it for 30 minutes and then close it.

string.name: desc
string.value: You closed the bottle after 30 minutes just like Gaga told you. Do you see moonlight in the bottle? Well, deliver it to Gaga anyway.

string.name: desc
string.value: A timer Cassandra gave you. The display appears to be broken. Better keep it for 1 hour anyways.

string.name: desc
string.value: A timer Cassandra gave you. It shows 60 min. 00 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broken piece of a crayon obtained from the Monster Park. You might be able to combine it more pieces to make a working crayon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broken piece of a crayon obtained from a Party Quest. You might be able to combine it with more pieces to make a working crayon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broken piece of a crayon obtained from monsters. You might be able to combine it with more pieces.

string.name: name
string.value: Marble That Evolves Into A Belt After 30 Minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gold Richie gave you this item, claiming he has absolutely no idea what it is. Make sure you leave more than 1 slot empty in your EQUIP inventory after 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: After 1 hour the gem changes into an item that can be used to upgrade the Evolving Belt. Make sure you leave more than 1 slot empty in your USE inventory after 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key to open a cage where the little Miwok Boy is locked up. #cClick# on the cage with this key in your inventory.

string.name: desc
string.value: A yummy rice roll made of many tasty ingredients.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious piece of chicken, smothered in a red spicy sauce.

string.name: desc
string.value: A carbonated drink that refreshes completely. Experience the sparkling taste!

string.name: desc
string.value: A fiery red rice cake. It's so spicy!

string.name: desc
string.value: A sports drink that gets absorbed faster than water.

string.name: desc
string.value: A frozen sports drink which gets absorbed way faster than water. It's so cold!

string.name: desc
string.value: Miraculous garlic. Eating only this for 100 straight days will turn a tiger into a human.

string.name: desc
string.value: A young mugwort with miraculous power. Patiently holding it for an hour will turn this young mugworth into a fully-grown mugworth.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red maple leaf pressed inside a book. This sure brings back memories. Pressing it for 3 or 4 hours will dry it, making it a perfect bookmark. \n#cIt disappears if you log out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Entrance Level: Lv. 120 or above\nRecommended Level: Lv. 120

string.name: desc
string.value: Cheerleading pom-poms used to cheer your team. Having them allows you to buff up every 30 minutes.\n#cDisappears if you log out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A device that will send you shooting through time. Its built in temporal interference dampener makes sure you don't ruin the timeline.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small pocket watch given to people returning to Maple World. Seems like this watch runs faster than other watches.\n#cHaving it allows you to gain 10% bonus EXP.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 마법의 할로윈 나무를 장식할 수 있는 할로윈 호박 등불이다. #c할로윈 관련 장비를 착용하고 할로윈 순간 이동의 돌을 사용하면 나무가 자라는 곳으로 이동하여 등불을 사용할 수 있습니다.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 먹으면 알수 없는 힘을 얻을 수 있는 할로윈 마법 사탕이다. 레벨에 따라 경험치를 상승시킨다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 황홀한 맛을 내는 할로윈 사탕이다. 할로윈 사탕 바구니에 50개를 채워보자.

string.name: desc
string.value: 게스트룸에서 얻은 가면 문양이 새겨진 키이다. 어디에 쓰이는 거지?

string.name: desc
string.value: 헌티드맨션 서재에서 얻은 가면 문양이 새겨진 키이다. 어디에 쓰이는 거지?

string.name: desc
string.value: 헌티드맨션 호박밭에서 얻은 가면 문양이 새겨진 키이다. 어디에 쓰이는 거지?

string.name: desc
string.value: 헌티드맨션 엉망진창 중앙홀에서 얻은 가면 문양이 새겨진 키이다. 어디에 쓰이는 거지?

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful golden ornament to decorate the town with for the Legends Awards. Gather them up and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fireworks to light up the night of the Legends Awards. Gather them up and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: Glass Marbles that will be used to decorate the town during the Legends Awards. Gather them up and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shiny Light Bulbs that will be used to decorate the town during the Legends Awards. Gather them up and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A flashy button that Maple Claws is looking for. Gather up 100 of them and bring them to Maple Claws.

string.name: desc
string.value: A trophy given to the Rock-Paper-Scissors Master. Very prestigious.

string.name: desc
string.value: A trophy given to a Great Protector who completes all 10 days of training.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shiny, gilded statue that belongs to Cassandra. It is remarkably ugly...you just want to get as far away from it as possible...

string.name: desc
string.value: A shiny, gilded statue that belongs to Cassandra. It is remarkably ugly...you just want to get as far away from it as possible...

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious stone that pulses with power. Grants the Great Fortitude skill once the gauge is charged. Charge it up by hunting monsters in certain hunting grounds with this stone in your Set-Up Inventory.

string.name: desc
string.value: A very Christmasy seal. You can exchange 100 of these for one Renegade Coin from Cassandra in the town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gooey lump of chocolate. Hold on it for 30 minutes to turn it into a beautiful Heart Chocolate.

string.name: desc
string.value: Made by holding on to Melted Chocolate for 30 minutes. Bring it to Inkwell!

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful force formed by a strong and righteous hero.

string.name: desc
string.value: A yummy roasted turkey you remember enjoying during Thanksgiving.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone imbued with the power of the Knights of Virtue.

string.name: desc
string.value: The best Premium Special Sundae ever!

string.name: desc
string.value: Black Dragon Crystal that's full of the dragon's energy. You can exchange 100 of these for 1 Renegade Coin from Cassandra in the town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweet chocolate perfect for Valentine's Day. You can exchange 100 of these for 1 Renegade Coin from Cassandra in the town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Valentine's Day chocolate where you can write a message of love on. Keep it in the Set-up tab for 30 minutes and your feelings just might reach that special someone!

string.name: desc
string.value: Valentine's Day Chocolate with message of love! Take it to Cassandra, the messenger of love, and your feelings WILL reach out to that special someone!

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks like a beautiful spring flower. Hold on to it for 30 minute and enjoy the spring breeze to receive a Star Stamp from Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: Colored sugar that glitters beautifully. Used to make homemade sugar.

string.name: desc
string.value: Crystal Ball that Cassandra entrusted to you. Hold on to it for 30 minutes to see your fortune for this year in the relationship department.

string.name: desc
string.value: This one is sparkling with fountains of lovely fortunes. Bring it to Cassandra to hear your fortune on *wink wink*.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicate brush used to color Easter Eggs. Keep it in your Inventory Set-up tab for 30 minutes to receive a Shiny Easter Egg Buff.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's nice and shiny, but it still needs a bit more work. Try making it even fancier! Keep it in your Inventory Set-up tab for 30 minutes to receive a Shiny Easter Egg Buff.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone containing the power of Virtue. The stone absorbs power every time you strike a monster. When the stone is full, you can use the basic attack key to use Virtue's Blessing, which lasts for 1 hour and can be stacked with other buffs.\r\n#cWhile Virtue's Blessing is in effect, the stone will no longer absorb power. The strength of the blessing will also increase when you reach Level 31 and Level 71.#

string.value: When you sit on Suri Chair, 50 HP and 30 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you sit on Yun Chair, 150 HP and 100 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you sit in Pink Bean Pollen Pot Chair, 100 HP and 100 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.
